name: Styrene/butadiene/acrylonitrile copolymers
FoodContactSubstance: Styrene/butadiene/acrylonitrile copolymers (CAS Reg. No. 9003-56-9, exclusive of minor co-monomers) containing up to 30% by weight of polymer units derived from acrylonitrile and up to 10% by weight of polymer units derived from one or more of the following monomers: acrylic acid, fumaric acid, 2-hydroxyethyl acrylate, itaconic acid, and methacrylic acid.
